title: John Batt
text:
John Michael Batt (born 22 September 1935) is a former Australian <a href="jurist">jurist</a> who was a <a href="Appellate%20court">Court of Appeal</a> <a href="Judge">justice</a> at the <a href="Supreme%20Court%20of%20Victoria">Supreme Court of Victoria</a>. He retired from the court in 2005, and prior to his judgeship had served as the <a href="Bar%20association">Bar</a> representative on the <a href="Chief%20Justice">Chief Justice</a>'s <a href="Supreme%20Court%20of%20Victoria">Supreme Court</a> Rules Committee.
In 2016 Batt was appointed a <a href="Member%20of%20the%20Order%20of%20Australia">Member of the Order of Australia</a> for significant service to the law and to the <a href="judiciary">judiciary</a> in Victoria, to legal scholarship, and to the <a href="Anglican%20Church%20of%20Australia">Anglican Church of Australia</a>.
